content.text:
# NRJ Music Awards 2009

NRJ Music Awards 2009 is a 2008 compilation album by NRJ.
Track listing

# "Hot n Cold" - Katy Perry — 3:42
# "Lovers in Japan" - Coldplay — 6:53
